dataset_id: BOREAS TF-10 NSA-YJP Tower Flux, Meteorological, and Porometry Data
title: BOREAS TF-10 NSA-YJP Tower Flux, Meteorological, and Porometry Data
summary: The flux and ancillary data collected at the NSA-YJP tower flux site by the TF-10 group.  Measurements of stomatal conductance collected at the NSA-YJP site by the TF-10 team.
